title: Brit Awards 2017: Chris Martin makes surprise appearance for tribute duet with late George Michael
text:
Brit Awards 2017: Chris Martin makes surprise appearance for tribute duet with late George Michael 
The Coldplay frontman performed a rendition of A Different Corner Wednesday 22 February 2017 21:17 GMT Click to followES Entertainment Tribute: Chris Martin makes a surprise Brits appearance to honour George Michael ITV 
Chris Martin made a surprise appearance at this yearâ€™s Brit Awards to pay tribute to the late George Michae l. The Coldplay frontman, who was not scheduled to appear at this yearâ€™s ceremony, arrived on stage to sing classic Michael song A Different Corner on Wednesday night, following a tribute from Whamâ€™s Ridgeley, Shirlie Holliman and Pepsi De Macque. While Martin sang one part of the song, a large screen showed Michael singing the accompanying verses. Although many people said that the performance brought a â€˜tearâ€™ to their eyes, others werenâ€™t too keen on Martinâ€™s tribute.
